doc.summary: Adds a new shaped recipe based on the input objects.
doc.text:
Adds a new shaped recipe based on the input objects. The input objects must be built like this:
(A sub list means that one of its elements can be used.
  • Optional: A ResourceLocation that serves as the recipe id.
    • An ItemLike for the output optionally followed by an Integer for the amount.
    • An ItemStack that is used to determine the output item and count.
  • A set of strings which are the pattern lines for the recipe.
  • The rest of the input must be a Character followed by an ingredient identifier repeated for each key from the pattern lines.

An ingredient identifier is one of the following:
  • An ItemLike
  • An TagKeyltItemgt
  • An Ingredient
  • A list of the ones above.

doc.summary: Adds a new shapeless recipe based on the input objects.
doc.text:
Adds a new shapeless recipe based on the input objects. The input objects must be built like this:
(A sub list means that one of its elements can be used.
  • Optional: A ResourceLocation that serves as the recipe id.
    • An ItemLike for the output optionally followed by an Integer for the amount.
    • An ItemStack that is used to determine the output item and count.
  • The rest of the input must be ingredient identifiers which set the required items.

An ingredient identifier is one of the following:
  • An ItemLike
  • An TagKeyltItemgt
  • An Ingredient
  • A list of the ones above.

doc.summary: A <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/recipe/RecipeExtension">RecipeExtension</ref> for shaped and shapeless recipes.
doc.text: A <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/recipe/RecipeExtension">RecipeExtension</ref> for shaped and shapeless recipes.
